description: This file implements a React context provider and hook for managing a notes application's state. It includes functions for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes, as well as maintaining UI state like selected note and search term.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Custom React hook to access notes context, throws error if used outside provider.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: React component providing notes state and CRUD functions to its children.
